channel.title: PC Podcast
channel.description:
A podcast about all things technology-related. Join your co-hosts Trevor Ciha and Pratik Panda as they discuss the latest news in the tech space. Follow us on Social Media: * Twitter: @PandaCihaPod * Facebook: PandaCihaPodcast * Instagram: PandaCihaPodcast * Twitch: PandaCihaPodcast

]]>

item.title: PC Podcast - Ep1
item.description:
This is the first episode. Join us as we talk about the Apex Legends RCE exploit, Neuralink updates, Stardew Valley 1.6, Battlefront Classic, and Microsoft Copilot!
